div.head: The TEI in the office
div.p: Our administration has said that minutes and letters are to be archived in XML. Can the TEI help us? We will consider how to build very specialized customizations of the TEI, and customize editing tools for easy authoring. We will also look at what markup to put in office documents so that they can be indexed in useful ways.
